page.title: 20LOCHABRIGGS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: { Locharbriggs Primary School is one of the major primary schools in the { {Heathhall}area. It is situated approx. 2 miles from Dumfries town centre. The school was built in 1954 and since then there have been further developments. The school has 420 pupils but decreasing rapidly. There are 16 full time teachers and 5 non teaching staff. The school has 17 classrooms and a large playing area. After visiting the school, we found out what the pupils thought about the school. We found that the pupils favourite subject was Maths, and there was a keen interest in sport. The school has a large catchment area and many pupils have to come by bus.
